title: Internal Compiler Error on Nightly on automated CI run: add_outlives_bounds: unexpected regions

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
We've experienced this issue, when compiling bincode today on an [automated CI run](https://github.com/purpleprotocol/purplecoin/actions/runs/4432849236/jobs/7777306619). All other CI runs experience the same issue with bincode. Locally on Macos I experience the same issue with the same compiler version. All previous versions would compile. ### Meta ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (ab654863c 2023-03-15) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C target_cpu=native -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C overflow-checks=off -C strip=debuginfo ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: /rustc/ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010/compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/outlives/env.rs:145:26: add_outlives_bounds: unexpected regions Error: internal compiler error: /rustc/ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010/compiler/rustc_infer/src/infer/outlives/env.rs:145:26: add_outlives_bounds: unexpected regions thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/ab654863c3d50482f260cf862647f1fe0ff5e010/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1644:9 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic:: 1: std::panic::panic_any:: 2: ::bug::<&alloc::string::String> 3: ::bug::<&alloc::string::String> 4: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::::{closure#0} 5: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::::{closure#0}, !>::{closure#0} 6: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_context_opt::::{closure#0}, !>::{closure#0}, !> 7: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 8: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 9: ::with_bounds::, ::implied_bounds_tys::{closure#0}>>> 10: rustc_hir_analysis::check::compare_impl_item::compare_method_predicate_entailment 11: rustc_hir_analysis::check::compare_impl_item::compare_impl_method 12: rustc_hir_analysis::check::check::check_impl_items_against_trait 13: rustc_hir_analysis::check::check::check_mod_item_types 14: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 15: ::check_mod_item_types 16: ::for_each_module:: 17: rustc_hir_analysis::check_crate 18: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 19: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 20: ::analysis 21: ::enter::> 22: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> 23: >::set::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_span::ErrorGuaranteed>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. ```
